mapper.sql: return_history_id, return_id, time, return_status, comment, customer_notified
mapper.select:
select
from xl_return_history where return_id = #{returnId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by `time` desc
mapper.insert:
insert into xl_return_history
return_history_id,
return_id,

comment,
customer_notified,

mapper.update:
update xl_return_history
return_id = #{returnId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
return_status = #{returnStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_notified = #{customerNotified,jdbcType=BIT},
where return_history_id = #{returnHistoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update xl_return_history set return_id = #{returnId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, return_status = #{returnStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_notified = #{customerNotified,jdbcType=BIT} where return_history_id = #{returnHistoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
